member.name: T:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.IO.CopyFiles
member.summary:
Copies a list of files or a directory tree to a destination
Support for GUI is implamented by the ICopyFilesDiag interface and passed to the class in the copy() method.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.IO.ShellIcon
member.summary: Summary description for ShellIcon.

Summary description for ShellIcon. Get a small or large Icon with an easy C# function call that returns a 32x32 or 16x16 System.Drawing.Icon depending on which function you call either GetSmallIcon(string fileName) or GetLargeIcon(string fileName)

member.name: T:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.IO.ShellIconNative
member.summary: Get a small or large Icon with an easy C# function call that returns a 32x32 or 16x16 System.Drawing.Icon depending on which function you call either GetSmallIcon(string fileName) or GetLargeIcon(string fileName)
